entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming south 20 in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
